summary: I want to know about the constellations in Exandria. Theres two moons, that’s cool, both different colors, but tell me about the...
body:
I want to know about the constellations in Exandria. Theres two moons, that’s cool, both different colors, but tell me about the stars!

They must have a story to them, something magical and mystical, like maybe one is called unicorn for some reason, or ranger. What sort of stories must people have made up or were true, in the creation of a cluster of stars being named after what people thought the shape was? 

Are their constellations for the gods? For dragons? Does the stories and names of the things differ between species? 

Tell me more about the sky, about the tapestry of night and it’s twinkling lights that are peacefully slept under.

I hope we learn more about the night sky besides the moons someday, is what I’m saying, because stars are really beautiful, and there must be a lot of them in that sky comparatively to us.

summary:
EPISODE 67 SPOILERS
This episode is already giving me an anxiety attack, I H A T E, to quote Ashley Johnson, piders, I feel for...
body:
EPISODE 67 SPOILERS

This episode is already giving me an anxiety attack, I H A T E, to quote Ashley Johnson, piders, I feel for Travis’s “kill it with fire”

Ashley’ 26 in initiative, hot damn!!


“g R A B THAT FUCKIN WIZARD”

“Dinner time” “fuck, that’s right, you e a t that shit”

“The mama is out and she has your wizard”

“Oh god, they’re turning people into spiders!!”

Almost nice critical hit

“LOOK AT THE SIZE OF ITS A S S ITS BIGGER THAN ME!!”

summary: Some small-town modern AU concepts: Caleb plays Neko Atsumi religiously. Yasha wears a snapback. She turns it backwards when she...
body:
Some small-town modern AU concepts:

Caleb plays Neko Atsumi religiously.

Yasha wears a snapback. She turns it backwards when she rages. She also plays the harp. In a band? It works.

Beau did some community service hours at the local library and then just… didn’t leave. (Dairon is there.)

Jester also haunts the library. There are romance novels there!

Molly is a star in the local theater productions. Fjord has recently moved from management/props & sets to directing when Vandren goes on vacation overseas. It’s scary but he’s good at it.

Caduceus hosts a farmers’ market in the graveyard. Nott and Yeza have a stall there. What do they sell? What don’t they, really. 

Luc and Kiri are bffs, Jester babysits them sometimes and it’s a lot of fun and a lot of chaos.

tags: that being said I know molly stans can be annoying but like you have the power to block people
summary: Hey @ people in the cr tag complaining about how people still think about and devote creative energy to Molly? First off you...
body: Hey @ people in the cr tag complaining about how people still think about and devote creative energy to Molly? First off you don’t get to tell an artist/creator what they should create and you shouldn’t complain about what they choose to create out of fucking common decency so if someone is creating Molly shit good for them. Second off tumblr has a blacklist feature, if you really hate seeing shit about Molly so much use it. Third off you don’t get to decide when someone should just ‘get over’ a character, like, what the fuck, especially if that character was lgbt and one of the ONLY nonbinary and bi main characters present across a vast majority of media. Fourth off it just!! Is not your business what characters people like!! What are you a cop!! If you want more content of a certain character idk you could always make it yourself instead of complaining! First rule of any fanbase should just be to mind your own damn business because this shit is annoying.

Third off you don’t get to decide when someone should just ‘get over’ a character, like, what the fuck, especially if that character was lgbt and one of the ONLY nonbinary and bi main characters present across a vast majority of media. Fourth off it just!! Is not your business what characters people like!! What are you a cop!! If you want more content of a certain character idk you could always make it yourself instead of complaining! First rule of any fanbase should just be to mind your own damn business because this shit is annoying.

First off you don’t get to tell an artist/creator what they should create and you shouldn’t complain about what they choose to create out of fucking common decency so if someone is creating Molly shit good for them. Second off tumblr has a blacklist feature, if you really hate seeing shit about Molly so much use it. Third off you don’t get to decide when someone should just ‘get over’ a character, like, what the fuck, especially if that character was lgbt and one of the ONLY nonbinary and bi main characters present across a vast majority of media. Fourth off it just!! Is not your business what characters people like!! What are you a cop!! If you want more content of a certain character idk you could always make it yourself instead of complaining! First rule of any fanbase should just be to mind your own damn business because this shit is annoying.

summary: If It's ok, what would you think about some  Vessah fluff, like be the pregnancy with Luc?
question: If It's ok, what would you think about some  Vessah fluff, like be the pregnancy with Luc?
answer:
I want to know what two people make up the name Vessah first, because im interested. Or is that an odd way of smashing together veth and yeza, because I have always thought of it mentally as Veza or Yeth. 

It could be veth and yussah, which is fucking fascinating a concept, but I need clarification because I can be dumb sometimes. 

I hope that’s what you mean, but if it isn’t tell me and Ill write a thing.
